scripts.bundle:dev:sellfs: npm run bundle:front:dev:sellfs && npm run bundle:server:dev:sellfs
scripts.bundle:prod:sellfs: npm run bundle:front:prod:sellfs && npm run bundle:server:prod:sellfs
scripts.lib:build: concurrently "npm run tsc -w dom-render" "npm run tsc -w simple-boot-core" "npm run tsc -w simple-boot-front" "npm run tsc -w simple-boot-http-server" "npm run tsc -w simple-boot-http-ssr"
scripts.lib:build:clean: concurrently "cd libs/dom-render && npm run tsc:clean" "cd libs/simple-boot-core && npm run tsc:clean" "cd libs/simple-boot-front && npm run tsc:clean" "cd libs/simple-boot-http-server && npm run tsc:clean" "cd libs/simple-boot-http-ssr && npm run tsc:clean"
scripts.lib:build:watch: concurrently "cd libs/dom-render && npm run tsc:watch" "cd libs/simple-boot-core && npm run tsc:watch" "cd libs/simple-boot-front && npm run tsc:watch" "cd libs/simple-boot-http-server && npm run tsc:watch" "cd libs/simple-boot-http-ssr && npm run tsc:watch"
